subject: Re: EVP and James Randi -- My Questions
author: Misty
full_text:
Hi Angela

LOL! Why dont they just give the winning lotto numbers that would be 
easier to aquire =)

Personally I never seek to prove this to anyone, they should 
prove/disprove it themselves. Even amongst those who arent skeptics, 
hearing varies. Sometimes everyones hears the same sometimes they 
dont. 

I also dont ask about lotto numbers LOL I dont play it.

As for building one yourself, most are trying out the radio 
modifications like the 12-470 or the 12-469 (horrible clicking on the 
469 model but a few have gotten around it. Theres a few others Frank 
and Steve have messed with. I think ones the 12-125 but I am a bit 
tired so all the model numbers arent popping in my head at the moment.

A few "how to" videos have been posted on youtube. You can type in 
the model numbers to access a few of Mike Colletta's (ufogeek)
available posts as well as several others who have made thier video 
instructions available online. 

I did try out a fan test session the other day. Tho they werent as 
loud as with water, I could still discern a few statements. They were 
so "bass" in tone that its almost out of my hearing range on a few so 
I didnt post them all. As for the ones I did they can be found on my 
esnips 

http://www.esnips.com/web/MiscellaneousMethodsofEVP

That should take ya to the right folder

Misty
